word_mean: 与船体基平面平行的任一水平面与船体型表面交线。
在任何吃水及倾斜情况下， 水面与船体型表面的交线。

sentence.Network_en: For steel structures in severe corrosive environment, both above and below waterline.
sentence.Network_cn: 用于严重腐蚀环境下钢结构的保护, 水线以上或水线以下均可使用.

entry.def: The waterline is a line, either real or imaginary, on the side of a ship representing the level the water reaches when the ship is at sea.

example.ex: Ray painted below the waterline with a special anti-rust paint.
example.tran: 雷用专门的防锈涂料涂船的吃水线以下的部位。

means.word_mean: 1. a line corresponding to the surface of the water when the vessel is afloat on an even keel; often painted on the hull of a ship
